scripts.minify-js: mkdir -p assets/js/min && for file in assets/js/**/*.js; do base=$(basename "$file") && name=${base%.js} && [[ $name == *.min ]] && continue || npx terser "$file" -o "assets/js/min/$name.min.js" --compress --mangle; done
scripts.minify-css: mkdir -p assets/css/min && npx cleancss -o assets/css/min/style.min.css assets/css/style.css
scripts.minify-html: npx html-minifier index.html -o index.min.html --collapse-whitespace --remove-comments --minify-css true --minify-js true
scripts.build: npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css && npm run minify-html
